experiences.description: Collected, analyzed, and reported on key performance indicators (KPIs) across various departments. Developed SQL queries to extract data from relational databases. Created dashboards and visualizations to present data insights to stakeholders. Identified areas for improvement in data quality and processes. Contributed to the development of data governance policies.

Designed, built, and maintained data pipelines for extracting, transforming, and loading (ETL) data from various sources. Developed and implemented data warehousing solutions using cloud-based technologies (AWS Redshift). Implemented data quality checks and monitoring processes. Collaborated with data scientists to provide data for machine learning models. Automated data processes using Python and Airflow.

Led the design and implementation of large-scale data infrastructure projects. Developed and maintained data pipelines for real-time data processing using Spark and Kafka. Optimized data storage and retrieval strategies for performance and scalability. Mentored junior data engineers. Implemented data security and access control measures. Evaluated and recommended new data technologies and tools.

education.institution: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
education.description: Focused on data structures, algorithms, and database management systems. Completed a senior project on developing a data mining application for predicting customer churn.

Specialized in machine learning and data mining techniques. Conducted research on developing scalable algorithms for analyzing large datasets. Published a research paper on a novel approach to anomaly detection.
